name: GetAdditionalTaxliabilityByLicensePlateNumber
description:
__Activity name:__ GetAdditionalTaxliabilityByLicensePlateNumber

This endpoint allows the user to acquire values for specific properties in the company car resource. This endpoint will require a license plate number (vehicle registration number), and will return aggregated data based on its RDW-registration.

licensePlateNumber.description: A valid vehicle registration (license plate) number.

Authorization.description: A valid Bearer token for authorizing the request.

Accept.description: The accept header is used to influence what type of output is returned and in most cases the version of the output

$ul: **obsoleteDate**: The date (can be null) on which the `resourceVersion` is no longer supported/available
**resourceVersion**: The resource version of the object in the response
**additionalTaxLiabilityGroup**: Indicates what additional tax liability percentage (bijtelling) should be used for calculating the tax liabiltiy in the payroll process.
**dateOfFirstAdmission**: First day of admission for the vehicle (datum eerste toelating).
**licensePlateNumber**: Vehicle registration (license plate of the vehicle). The number should be provided with or without any hyphens (-).
**valueForTaxPurposes**: The value of the vehicle for tax purposes. This field may only be NULL if a reason for no additional tax liability (reden voor geen bijtelling) is provided.
**obsoleteDate**: The date (can be null) on which the `resourceVersion` is no longer supported/available
**resourceVersion**: The resource version of the object in the response
